subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text: {{Han simp|愛|f=𢖻|t=友}}. This character is not known to exist<!-- Note: Not found in http://dict.variants.moe.edu.tw 《異體字字典》 or 《宋元以來俗字譜》 --> until the {{w|Chinese Character Simplification Scheme|simplification of Chinese characters}} by the People's Republic of China in 1956. <!-- Refer https://zh.wikisource.org/wiki/漢字簡化方案 -->
